alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lexington, north central Aiken and southeastern Saluda Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Red Bank, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Batesburg-Leesville, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Oak Grove, St. Andrews, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, West Columbia Riverwalk, Pelion, Gilbert, Summit and Monetta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 32 and 64. Interstate 26 between mile markers 104 and 118. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
